title: Las Vegas - Best of Coast to Coast AM - 4/30/21
itunes:title: Las Vegas - Best of Coast to Coast AM - 4/30/21
description:
George Noory and author Bill Friedman discuss the mafia's connections to the creation of Las Vegas, how casinos dealt with people with massive gambling debts, and how entertainers like Frank Sinatra, Dean Martin and Don Rickles attracted gamblers to the casinos.

Learn more about your ad-choices at https://www.iheartpodcastnetwork.com

See omnystudio.com/listener for privacy information.
